LanguageData.PlantRice.label: rice plant
LanguageData.PlantRice.description: A low grain plant that thrives in rich soil and yields food fast, but is not nice to eat uncooked.
LanguageData.PlantPotato.label: potato plant
LanguageData.PlantPotato.description: A simple, highly nutritious tuber. Grows well even in somewhat poor soil. Harvests quickly. A strong, versatile crop.
LanguageData.PlantCorn.label: corn plant
LanguageData.PlantCorn.description: A large grain plant which produces ears of delicious yellow seeds. Takes a relatively long time to grow, but yields lots of food, and takes a long time to spoil. Needs fertile soil to grow well.
LanguageData.PlantStrawberry.label: strawberry plant
LanguageData.PlantStrawberry.description: A fragile but tasty fruit. Delicious even when raw.
LanguageData.PlantHaygrass.label: haygrass
LanguageData.PlantHaygrass.description: A mixture of nutrient-rich grasses which yield large amounts of hay. Hay is edible for animals, but not humans.
LanguageData.PlantCotton.label: cotton plant
LanguageData.PlantCotton.description: Yields cotton, a fine plant fiber used to make cloth.
LanguageData.PlantDevilstrand.label: devilstrand
LanguageData.PlantDevilstrand.description: This fragile mushroom was genetically engineered to produce a silk net of the highest grade. Long rumored to have mystical properties, it owes its name to the greed it inspires in people.
LanguageData.PlantHealroot.label: healroot
LanguageData.PlantHealroot.description: A slow-growing plant which yields herbal medicine when harvested.\n\nHealroot was selectively bred for centuries by settlers. It is sometimes also called "healer's hand" by tribespeople - a nickname it owes to its five major medicinal virtues.
LanguageData.PlantHops.label: hop plant
LanguageData.PlantHops.description: A flowering plant that yields hops, an essential ingredient in beer.
LanguageData.PlantSmokeleaf.label: smokeleaf plant
LanguageData.PlantSmokeleaf.description: A leafy plant cultivated for its psychological effects. Smokeleaf leaves can be prepared into joints at the crafting spot.
LanguageData.PlantPsychoid.label: psychoid plant
LanguageData.PlantPsychoid.description: A leafy plant. Its leaves can be refined into various forms of the psychoid drug.
